page.title: 17Media
page.content: Media is the press, radio and television. From these we can learn about things around the world. Some of the national newspapers are the Sun, Mirror, Guardian and The Times.We get free newspapers through our door. They have adverts as well as local news. The newspapers often have a different version of the same story but with still the same facts. "Jackie" is a girls' magazine.It has stories, a horoscope and a problem page.The "Look in" is a magazine for boys and girls.It has stories like the A-Team, Supergran, Street Hawk and Cannon and Ball. Dora and Russell from Nightingale Primary School really enjoy doing the Quick Quizzes as there are always prizes to be won.
